text: @JDiamond1 Do we really think @realDonaldTrump's Covid-19 petri dish creating a hot spot to spread to the corners from where the attendees came to most certainly bring death to unsuspecting others will boost #BunkerBoy's mood should be permitted? He is #CovidTrump.
